subject.topic: Civilian Conservation Corps (U.S.) -- Officials and employees -- History -- 20th century
Oak Ridge and WWII effort in Tennessee .

subject.geographic: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).

mods.note: This certificate acknowledges Charles Edward Rutherford`s promotion certificate to Assistant Leader for Civilian Conservation Corps, Company 417 in Tellico Plains, Tennessee.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
